ThreadList.Loadbox.partialComplete.message: Downloaded the most recent %1 of %2 threads.

Browser.Popup.openInGmail.message: Open in Gmail (hold Shift to use new tab)

NoLabels.message: Get started by adding labels that start with %1.

LabelsInfo.desc.statuses.message: Define the current status of an email task (e.g. S/Action, S/Waiting On, S/Some Day). Status labels provide the foundation for 'actioning' emails into tasks.

LabelsInfo.desc.projects.message: Project labels group related emails and tasks into projects. Can be hierarchical (e.g. P/MyProject/MySubProject).

LabelsInfo.desc.contexts.message: Context labels group related emails and tasks by context. This could be a physical place (C/Office, C/Home), a physical activity (C/OnPhone), or perhaps a group of people (C/ProjectXTeam).

LabelsInfo.desc.references.message: Reference labels identify an email as a type of resource for easier retrieval (e.g. R/MeetingNotes, R/Invoices).

LabelsInfo.desc.old.message: Used to retain labels that are no longer actively used, e.g. Old/P/MyProject

Box.setup.msg.message: The GTD features do not appear to be properly set up for this account.

Box.setup.complete.message: Your labels have been added but Gmail needs refreshing to complete the installation. Refresh Gmail now?

Box.label.message: Show active %1 items in Gmail (use Shift+click to see all)

ServerErrorReport.confirmApproveHTML.message:
GTDInbox would like to include your Gmail layout.

However, as it may include some text from your emails, we would like to check this is okay with you. (We do not store this information for more than 14 days - just while we fix the problem, then we delete it from our systems - and it's extremely useful).


Okay to include Gmail layout information?
